ygData.subject: Re: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: a level cap would be nice, but my cleric was able to purchase banded at level 8 without help and I dont think they would cap banded that low ... From: Avron
ygData.messageBody:
a level cap would be nice, but my cleric was able to purchase banded at
level 8 without help and I dont think they would cap banded that low
----- Original Message -----
From: Avron <avron@...>
To: EverQuest <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 10:46 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: New Survey


> From: Avron <avron@...>
>
>
> Well the problem now is that they are stopping twinking by making items NO
> DROP, which ruins the playerbased economy since you can't trade the
> items at all, I think level caps would be a MUCH better way to deal with
> it.. Level caps and LORE that is..
>
> - Avron Elselynn -
>
>
> From: Jonathan <jp1234@...>
>
> >Twinking is okay to a certain extent, but a level 1 should not have full
> >steel and a ghoulbane. What's the point of even playing the character?
> >Isnt half the fun getting some of the items yourself? I can understand
> >and have no problem with some twinking.. maybe some bronze and a pretty
> >good weapon and shield, but that's just dumb.
>
>
>
